amendment.description: To clarify that availability of legislation does not include nonbusiness days.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2930 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2930 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S2490-2491, S2499; text: CR S2490) To clarify that availability of legislation does not include nonbusiness days.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2930 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2930 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Obama.
